query:
-- 查找张三的用户信息
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = '张三';

-- 查找张三的授权记录
SELECT sp.*, su.name as stock_user_name 
FROM stockUserPermissions sp
JOIN users u ON sp.userId = u.id
JOIN stockUsers su ON sp.stockUserId = su.id
WHERE u.username = '张三';
